## ATS Platform

Name of the ATS platform (e.g., Jobvite, SmartRecruiters, BambooHR).

## Example Career Pages

Provide 2-3 URLs of company career pages powered by this ATS:

1. https://...
2. https://...
3. https://...

## Public API

- [ ] This ATS has a public job listings API (provide docs link if known)

## Detection Pattern

How can this ATS be identified? Provide any of the following:

- **URL pattern:** (e.g., `*.myworkdayjobs.com`, `jobs.lever.co/*`)
- **Meta tags:** (e.g., `<meta name="generator" content="...">`)
- **DOM structure:** (e.g., specific class names, data attributes)

## Current Behavior

What happens when job-hunter-agent encounters this ATS today? (e.g., falls back to generic scraping, returns no jobs, errors out)

## Additional Context

Any other information about this ATS (documentation links, rate limits, authentication requirements).
